name: SetVehicleAngularVelocity
warnings: This function has no effect on unoccupied vehicles and does not affect trains.
versions: This function was added in SA-MP 0.3b and will not work in earlier versions!
description: Sets the angular X, Y and Z velocity of a vehicle

params_body.name: vehicleid
params_body.description: The ID of the vehicle to set the velocity of.

params_body.name: Float:X
params_body.description: The amount of velocity in the angular X direction.

params_body.name: Float:Y
params_body.description: The amount of velocity in the angular Y direction .

params_body.name: Float:Z
params_body.description: The amount of velocity in the angular Z direction.

return_values:
1: The function executed successfully. 

 0: The function failed to execute. The vehicle does not exist.
related_fn:
SetVehicleVelocity: Set a vehicle's velocity.
 GetVehicleVelocity: Get a vehicle's velocity.
